H0.text: what was the city of beijing previously known as. Yanjing

H1.text: what was the city of beijing previously known as. Dadu

H2.text: what was the city of beijing previously known as. Beiping

H3.text: what was the city of beijing previously known as. Peking

A4.text: the name Beijing, which means 'Northern Capital'... was applied to the city in 1403 during the Ming dynasty to distinguish the city from Nanjing

A5.text: local military commanders founded their own short-lived Yan dynasties and called the city Yanjing, or the 'Yan Capital'
